mapper.insert: insert into FORUM_THEME (ID, NAME, SECTION_ID, INPUTER, INPUT_ORG_ID, ATTACHMENT_PATH, ATTACHMENT_NAME, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, REPLY_COUNT, READ_COUNT, LATEST_REPLY_ID, LATEST_REPLY_NAME, LATEST_REPLY_TIME, LABEL, SET_TOP, STATE, CONTENT ) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sectionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{inputer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{attachmentPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{replyCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{readCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{latestReplyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{latestReplyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latestReplyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{setTop,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{content,jdbcType=CLOB} )

ID,

update FORUM_THEME
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SECTION_ID = #{record.sectionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INPUTER = #{record.inputer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INPUT_ORG_ID = #{record.inputOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ATTACHMENT_PATH = #{record.attachmentPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTACHMENT_NAME = #{record.attachmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REPLY_COUNT = #{record.replyCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
READ_COUNT = #{record.readCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LATEST_REPLY_ID = #{record.latestReplyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LATEST_REPLY_NAME = #{record.latestReplyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LATEST_REPLY_TIME = #{record.latestReplyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LABEL = #{record.label,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SET_TOP = #{record.setTop,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATE = #{record.state,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CONTENT = #{record.content,jdbcType=CLOB},

update FORUM_THEME
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SECTION_ID = #{sectionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INPUTER = #{inputer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INPUT_ORG_ID = #{inputOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ATTACHMENT_PATH = #{attachmentPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTACHMENT_NAME = #{attachmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REPLY_COUNT = #{replyCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
READ_COUNT = #{readCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LATEST_REPLY_ID = #{latestReplyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LATEST_REPLY_NAME = #{latestReplyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LATEST_REPLY_TIME = #{latestReplyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LABEL = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SET_TOP = #{setTop,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=CLOB},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update FORUM_THEME set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECTION_ID = #{sectionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INPUTER = #{inputer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INPUT_ORG_ID = #{inputOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ATTACHMENT_PATH = #{attachmentPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTACHMENT_NAME = #{attachmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REPLY_COUNT = #{replyCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, READ_COUNT = #{readCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LATEST_REPLY_ID = #{latestReplyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LATEST_REPLY_NAME = #{latestReplyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LATEST_REPLY_TIME = #{latestReplyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LABEL = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SET_TOP = #{setTop,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=CLOB} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update FORUM_THEME set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECTION_ID = #{sectionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INPUTER = #{inputer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INPUT_ORG_ID = #{inputOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ATTACHMENT_PATH = #{attachmentPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTACHMENT_NAME = #{attachmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REPLY_COUNT = #{replyCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, READ_COUNT = #{readCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LATEST_REPLY_ID = #{latestReplyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LATEST_REPLY_NAME = #{latestReplyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LATEST_REPLY_TIME = #{latestReplyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LABEL = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SET_TOP = #{setTop,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select (select user_name from user_ where user_id = inputer) as inputer_name,
from forum_theme
REPLY_COUNT!=0
order by
REPLY_COUNT
UPDATE_TIME
LATEST_REPLY_TIME
desc nulls last,id desc

select , (select user_name from user_ where user_id = t.inputer) as inputerName from FORUM_THEME t where exists (select distinct THEME_ID from THEME_REPLY r where INPUTER = #{inputer,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.ID = r.THEME_ID )
select * from (select ft.id, ft.name, ft.create_time from forum_theme ft where ft.section_id = #{forumId} order by ft.CREATE_TIME desc) where rownum < 7

select count(*) from forum_theme ft where ft.section_id = #{forumId}
and ft.name like concat(concat('%',#{title}),'%')
mapper.update:
update FORUM_THEME
REPLY_COUNT = #{replyCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
READ_COUNT = #{readCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LATEST_REPLY_ID = #{latestReplyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LATEST_REPLY_NAME = #{latestReplyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LATEST_REPLY_TIME = #{latestReplyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id=#{id}
